mapper.sql: SELECT IFNULL(dev.new_device_id,dev.device_id) AS deviceId, dev.new_device_id AS dbDeviceId, dev.device_name AS deviceName, dev.dev_desc AS deviceDesc, a.connect_state AS connStatus, a.online_state AS onlineStatus, b.default_tag AS defaultFlag, IFNULL(d.validTeaCount,0) AS reserveNum, a.client_ip_address AS ipAddress, dc.image_large AS deviceImg, a.province, a.city, a.district, a.address, dev.company_id AS companyId, cmp.company_name AS companyName, a.longitude, a.latitude, dev.device_type_id AS deviceType, wa.wifi_ssid AS WiFiSSID FROM tb_device_state_info a INNER JOIN tb_user_device b ON a.device_id = b.device_id INNER JOIN tb_actived_device_info dev ON dev.device_id = a.device_id LEFT JOIN tb_company cmp ON cmp.id = dev.company_id LEFT JOIN tb_device_color dc ON dev.dev_color = dc.color_id LEFT JOIN tb_wifi_address wa ON wa.ip_address = a.client_ip_address LEFT JOIN (select count(1) validTeaCount,device_id FROM tb_user_book where valid_flag in (0,1) group by device_id) d ON d.device_id = a.device_id
mapper.select: select * from tb_actived_device_info where device_id = #{value} limit 1
